PIVMat Function Reference<< Prev | Next >> 
openimg
Import an IMG file from the Current Directory browser

Description 
Click on a IMG file in the Current Directory browser to import the 
data. A variable named 'im' is created (or overwrited) in the workspace.
See Also 
loadvec 
 
Published output in the Help browser 
   showdemo openimg
